verses.roman:
bhakti-miśra-kṛta-puṇye kona jīvottama
rajo-guṇe vibhāvita kari' tāṅra mana

synonyms: bhakti-miśra-kṛta-puṇye—because of pious activities mixed with devotional service; kona—someone; jīva-uttama—the best of the living entities; rajaḥ-guṇe—by the mode of passion; vibhāvita—influenced; kari'-making; tāṅra—his; mana—mind.
translation: "Because of his past pious activities mixed with devotional service, the first-class living entity is influenced by the mode of passion within his mind.
